item.title: Use minikube for local kubernetes development
item.description:
Install kubernetes is quite complex and people usually ops to use the automation tool that bootstrap whole cluster on a cloud provider. Recently kubenetes introduce [minikube] allow us do the same but on local computer. This tool helps us play around with kubernetes easily.
